items.title: Ghanaian music star Shatta Wale detained over Lamborghini purchase
items.description: US authorities have linked Wale's car to an alleged criminal enterprise operating stateside.

items.title: Russia launches biggest wave of strikes on Ukraine for weeks
items.description: Ukrainian officials say the attacks included drones, hypersonic, ballistic, and cruise missiles.

items.title: Palestinians flee Gaza City districts as Israel says first stages of assault have begun
items.description: An Israeli military spokesman says troops will deepen the damage to the "terror infrastructure" held by Hamas.

items.title: Texas approves new electoral map favouring Republicans
items.description: Facing opposition from Democrats who fled the state to stall the vote, Republicans hope the new maps will lead to more seats in Congress.

items.title: 'Nicest judge in the world' Frank Caprio dies aged 88
items.description: The US celebrity judge and social media star has been remembered for his "unique brand of compassion".
